parentDataList.nodeContext: Draw.rect(arrowRegion,x + Geometry.d4(i).x * (tilesize / 2f + a * 6f + 2) * uptime,y + Geometry.d4(i).y * (tilesize / 2f + a * 6f + 2) * uptime,i * 90f)
Draw.rect(arrowRegion,x + Geometry.d4(i).x * (tilesize / 2f + a * 6f + 2) * uptime,y + Geometry.d4(i).y * (tilesize / 2f + a * 6f + 2) * uptime,i * 90f);

currentLineData.nodeContext: Draw.rect(arrowRegion,x + Geometry.d4(i).x * (tilesize / 2f + a * 6f + 2) * uptime,y + Geometry.d4(i).y * (tilesize / 2f + a * 6f + 2) * uptime,i * 90f)
